mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board( board_title, board_summary, user_no, user_nickname, local_category) VALUES ( #{boardTitle}, #{boardSummary},#{userNo}, #{userNickname}, #{localCategory})
mapper.select: SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo, USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname, BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle, BOARD_VIEW AS boardView, INPUT_DATE AS inputDate, recommend AS recommend, LOCAL_CATEGORY AS localCategory FROM BOARD ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC

SELECT count(*) FROM BOARD
BOARD_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%') OR BOARD_SUMMARY LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
USER_NICKNAME LIKE CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY INPUT_DATE DESC

SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo, USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname, BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle, BOARD_SUMMARY AS boardSummary, BOARD_VIEW AS boardView, DATE_FORMAT(INPUT_DATE, '%y-%m-%d %H:%m') AS inputDate, recommend AS recommend, LOCAL_CATEGORY AS localCategory FROM board WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo}

SELECT BOARD_NO AS boardNo, U.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname, BOARD_TITLE AS boardTitle, BOARD_SUMMARY AS boardSummary, BOARD_VIEW AS boardView, DATE_FORMAT(INPUT_DATE, '%y-%m-%d %H:%m') AS inputDate, recommend AS recommend, LOCAL_CATEGORY AS localCategory FROM Board B JOIN Member U ON B.user_no= U.user_no WHERE U.user_id = #{userId}

SELECT B.board_no AS boardNo, U.USER_NICKNAME AS userNickname, B.board_title AS boardTitle, B.board_summary AS boardSummary, B.board_view AS boardView, DATE_FORMAT(B.INPUT_DATE, '%y-%m-%d %H:%m') AS inputDate, B.recommend AS recommend, B.LOCAL_CATEGORY AS localCategory FROM recommend r JOIN BOARD B ON R.board_no = B.board_no JOIN Member U ON B.user_no = U.user_no WHERE r.user_id = #{user_id}
select M.user_id as userId from member M join board B ON B.user_no= M.user_no where M.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM RECOMMEND WHERE BOARD_NO = #{boardNo} and USER_ID = #{userId}
